1406620.name: Fantasy Grounds - Aquatic Menace 4!
1406620.description:
Aquatic Menace 4!

This Token Pack contains some uncommon aquatic creatures to be used in your Adventures. Included Tokens with color/weapon variations.

This product includes:
  • Cetaceal
  • Crabfolk_axe
  • Crabfolk_blue
  • Crabfolk_crossbow
  • Crabfolk_cutlass
  • Crabfolk_harpoon
  • Crabfolk_javelin
  • Crabfolk_mace

  • Crabfolk_yellow

  • Gillman_Male
  • Locathah_bellystabber_blue
  • Locathah_bellystabber_red
  • Locathah_bellystabber_yellow
  • Locathah_Drowner_blue

  • Locathah_Drowner_yellow

  • Locathah_Sharkimpaler_yellow
